requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 610
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: core i5 3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Rx 580 (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio

Minimum:
  • OS: Only Windows for now
  • Processor: Anything will do
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Probably anything, or even nothing
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent (1 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard

Minimum:

  • Processor: Above Pentium 4.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Above DirectX（R）9.0c /pixelshader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Above Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Above DirectX（R）9.0c /pixelshader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
